metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4566 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: mod_nss 1.0.8 and earlier, when NSSVerifyClient is set to none for the server/vhost context, does not enforce the NSSVerifyClient setting in the directory context, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
